    deleteCell(int) - Method in class Row
    deletes the cell at give index
    deleteCol() - Method in class Table
    delete the currently selected column if any
    deleteRow() - Method in class Table
    deletes the selected row
    deleteTable() - Method in class TableManager
    delete selected table
    drawMode(Frame, Graphics) - Method in class Mode
    Draws the relevant mode
    drawMode(Frame, Graphics) - Method in class TableDesignMode
    Draws table designer screen If a name or default value is invalid: mark it as red otherwise keep it gray If a cell in the appropriate column has an invalid value: Mark the violated field in red otherwise keep it gray
    drawMode(Frame, Graphics) - Method in class TableRowsMode
    Draws table designer screen If a name or default value is invalid: mark it as red otherwise keep it gray If a cell in the appropriate column has an invalid value: Mark the violated field in red otherwise keep it gray
    drawMode(Frame, Graphics) - Method in class TablesMode
    Draws table manager screen If a name is invalid: mark it as red otherwise keep it gray
